data.title: Walked Out
data.text: Stopped in to get a a Burger as we have heard it is very good it was 9:30PM on Wednesday.  Waited almost 10 Mins and no one ever came by and even tried to get by the bar to order and no one even seemd to care.  Wound not waste my time again

data.title: Very Quaint Place with Great Food
data.text: During my stay in St Joseph, MO, we visited Norty's Bar and Grill. It is a small place but was large enough to fit our party of 20 or so. The wait staff was very good and the sandwich I had tasted wonderful. If in the area, stop in and check them out.

data.title: Best reuben around
data.text: The reuben sandwich here is one of the best I have ever eaten. I have been there multiple times to get it over the course of 2014 and would do it all over again. The wait staff is relatively friendly and attentive. The atmosphere is definitely that of a bar.

data.title: Fun freindly local;
data.text: Had a business night out. Just enough music and friendly locals to break up out meeting in a good way.

data.title: Great bar food.
data.text: We love their Ruben sandwich and sweet potato fries, but everything on their menu is very good. Plenty of TV's for watching sports.

data.title: Nice Bar...Slow Service
data.text: Visited here with friends during game 3 of the World Series.  This is a smaller neighborhood bar.  We were served quickly, but once the game started service was non existent. The bar wasn't too crowded, our server was just hanging out behind the bar watching the game.  To order food someone had to go and tell our server we wanted to order.  We finally just started ordering our drinks at the bar since he would not come back to our table.  I loved the atmosphere here just not the slow service.  My friends who are locals, said the last few times service was slow too.  I'll give them another chance during my next visit, just this first visit was rather slow.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Have been to Norty's for lunch on several occasions. The food has been good and the service is fast and friendly.

data.title: Smoke  free but food is dull
data.text: Played trivia there for a number of weeks. After about three weeks, I found that I was either eating at home or elsewhere. The food is just not good.  I am not a drinker while out, so food would be good. HERE, food is NOT good.
